Description: Glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding two hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the legs are inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs overlain at the front with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
